'''''A Hunter Never Loses Their Prey''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, complete the [["Eyes on the Feathered Prize" Challenge]] northeast of the Obsidian Totem Pole in the [["Flower-Feather Clan"]].
